logo.description: Properties to customize the site's logo, considering both light and dark modes.

src.description: The source of the logo image.

srcCollapsed.description: The source of the collapsed logo image.

srcDark.description: The source of the logo image in dark mode.

srcCollapsedDark.description: The source of the collapsed logo image in dark mode.

logoTitle.description: The title on the bottom of the logo

logoTitleCollapsed.description: The title on the bottom of the logo in collapsed sider.

alt.description: The alt text for the logo image.

href.description: The URL that the logo links to.

width.description: The width of the logo image.

height.description: The height of the logo image.

width.description: The width of the collapsed logo image.

height.description: The height of the collapsed logo image.

theme.description: The theme of the sider. If it's set to 'dark' or 'light', the entered theme will be applied to the sider regardless of the site's dark mode status.

companyName.description: The name of the company or organization.

brandName.description: The name of the brand or product.
